price: ហើយវាមិនមែនជាពាក្យពេចន៍របស់អ្នកកវីឡើយ។ តែអ្វីដែលពួកអ្នកជឿនោះគឺតិចតួចបំផុត។
arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamā huwa biqawli shāʿirin qalīlan mā tu'minūna
